response_parsed.title: Containerizing Cron-Driven Tasks using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to containerize cron-driven tasks using the FastAPI framework along with Python 3.12+, ensuring scalable, efficient, and maintainable background job processing.
key_points: Understanding Docker for creating lightweight, portable containers
Setting up a base Dockerfile to install Python 3.12+ and dependencies
Creating a FastAPI app for scheduling cron tasks
Configuring Cron jobs in the container to trigger FastAPI endpoints
Writing tests for cron-driven tasks with pytest
Building and running the containerized application
